sentences.sContent: Animal and man come unto me, the anchorite.
sentences.sContent_eng: Animal and man come unto me, the anchorite.
sentences.sCn: 动物和人都来找我这个隐士。

sentences.sContent: This uncommon word, never before spoken in Star Wars, an anchorite is someone who has withdrawn from society to become somewhat of a religious hermit.
sentences.sContent_eng: This uncommon word, never before spoken in Star Wars, an anchorite is someone who has withdrawn from society to become somewhat of a religious hermit.
sentences.sCn: 这个不常见的词之前从未在《星战》中出现，“隐士”是指那种退出社会，在某种程度上变成宗教的隐居修道士的人。

sentences.sContent: He lived in Paris more lonely than an anchorite in the deserts of Thebes.
sentences.sContent_eng: He lived in Paris more lonely than an anchorite in the deserts of Thebes.
sentences.sCn: 他住在巴黎，比住在底比斯沙漠里的隐士生活还要孤独。

trans.tranOther: a person who lives in seclusion, esp a religious recluse; hermit
